author: _shemnon
content: How long will it take teams to add "Osaka" to their list of forks and migrate EOF activation to that branch?  This will be a required step for the Osaka-devnet-0 branch, obviously.

author: marioevz
content:
`Osaka` fork has been merged to EEST main, so we will need support from evmone for the `Osaka` fork (and other T8N tools) to fill the new release.

Also PTAL at the docs that now list EOF as the first EIP under Osaka: https://ethereum.github.io/execution-spec-tests/main/tests/osaka/
